H0.text: What is the lightest metal under standard conditions. Lithium

H1.text: What is the lightest metal under standard conditions. Beryllium

H2.text: What is the lightest metal under standard conditions. Magnesium

H3.text: What is the lightest metal under standard conditions. Uthium

A4.text: Under standard conditions, it is the least dense metal and the least dense solid element.

A5.text: The next lightest solid element (potassium, at 0.862 g/cm3) is more than 60% denser.
